news_content.album: 16/09/2022 - Album release||At last, we finally released our first album "Tago Mago", and we know that you will enjoy the Tagomagic.||tagomagic.jpg
news_content.myway: 22/07/2022 - Second single "My Way" release||After the release of our first single, we want to share with you all another part of our project, this is "My Way". You can listen to My Way on our music section, or find it in Spotify and your favorite platform. Check it out!||myway.jpeg
news_content.freedom: 10/06/2022 - First single "Freedom" release||After a long delay, we have finally published the first single from our upcoming album. You can listen to Freedom on our music section, or find it in Spotify and your favorite platform. Check it out!||freedom.png
news_content.new_record: 20/09/2021 - New record almost finished||We are working in the last touches to finish our first record, which will see the light of day during next year. Stay tuned!||
news_content.gig1: 21/02/2020 - Gig at the Hollander (Seville)||We will be playing our first gig along Surya at the Hollander in Seville.||hollander.jpeg

history_content: In the begining there was the Tagomagic. Aeons after, Tago Mago was born, when its three members heeded the call and decided to act. Soon after, the songs which would comprise their first album were born, channeled from the tagomagish source through the filter of their heads. Birthed in Seville's Sputnik studios, this first effort is a faithful representation of pure Tagomagic. "Freedom", their first single, is a good example of it.
copy_text: Made with love by Tago Mago ðŸ–¤
